about_the_game:
Take a leap into the deep fantasy world and its history before Sylebrium. Join Aralion, one of many friendly Sirmagils that live in the forest of Gordenbourg to help him save the Kingdom of Amun's children from The Great Army of North. In your journey, the task is to collect all 7 petals from orchid from every one of 7 kingdoms of children of Amun. If you succeed, the light shall prevail, if not, the new, dark, path shall be forged for the 7 kingdoms of Earth.

Take a leap of trust in open world game while narrator develops ancient history and explains it to you. Feet tingling is guaranteed. The game is designed as a walking simulator with fantasy story, or interactable movie. Player can't interact with how story flows, except on the end, where there is a choice to be made.

It is a first game in planned series that follows main protagonist Aralion in his journey. He got a task - to stop an evil Virey servant from Rahun (frozen north) who wants to conquer The Land of Amun (one of physical worlds that Amun - supreme entity - created in The Time of Genesis). Story takes place in fictional land with seven kingdoms and to stop northern army, The First Children of Amun created a pact - that only a full orchid bloom, formed from seven petals in seven kingdoms, can stop evil Virey servant from awakening army from Rahun and conquering The Land of Amun.

Enjoy peaceful environment, get away from every day routine and dive into rich world that offers much more than pleasing visuals and good story.
